title: Interpretation of crying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you the interpretation of crying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin, and we explain the interpretation of this vision. Mere psychological concerns that have no meaning or significance. Interpretation scholars have provided many connotations and explained that interpretations of dreams differ according to the state of the sleeper. This is why we will explain to you through an encyclopedia, the most important of which is what scholars said in interpreting this vision and its repercussions on the unmarried, married, and pregnant girl. Interpretation of crying in... A dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if the sleeper sees in a dream that he is crying loudly and screaming loudly, this is a sign that he heard news that brings sadness to his heart. This dream can indicate problems and obstacles that the dreamer will face in the future. His life. Crying without a sound in a dream indicates the arrival of happy and joyful news, and if the dreamer is an unmarried young man, this is a sign of the approaching date of his marriage. Crying without tears in a dream indicates problems and crises that the dreamer is exposed to. If the dreamer sees in a dream that He cries a lot, as this is a sign of getting rid of worries and problems. A dream about crying during prayer indicates the dreamer’s repentance for the sins he committed. Crying loudly in a dream, tearing black clothes, and screaming indicates the death of someone close to the dreamer. And if the dreamer sees a dead person crying a lot, then this A sign that this person needs someone to pray over him and befriend him. Seeing a dead person crying silently in a dream means that he is in a high position with God Almighty. Interpretation of crying in a dream according to Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi will see that if the dreamer sees himself crying loudly in a dream and hitting his face And he screams loudly, this is an indication of the problems he faces in his life. If the dreamer sees that he is crying while he is afraid, this indicates his repentance of sins and his fear of God Almighty. Crying without a sound in a dream indicates a long life for the dreamer and that God will grant him happiness in this time. Life. Crying at a funeral without a sound indicates joy and happiness in the sleeper’s life. Seeing a dead person crying loudly could mean that the dead person has many debts and wants someone to pay them. Interpretation of crying in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl crying loudly in a dream means that she is worried about Her marriage was delayed. Crying loudly in a dream shows the troubles and problems that an unmarried girl faces in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is crying cold tears, this is good news for her salvation from sorrows and worries, and this vision sometimes indicates the approaching date of the wedding. Interpretation of crying In a dream for a married woman: The dream of a married woman crying a lot indicates that there are disagreements between her and her husband, which may lead to separation. If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is crying, this is a sign that Almighty God will carry her in the near future. Crying without a loud sound in A married woman’s dream indicates the stability she experiences in her married life. Seeing her crying and screaming loudly in a dream

title: Interpretation of dreams of seeing cardamom in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which Hilvi sees watercress in a dream and interpretation of seeing watercress in a dream through the interpretation books of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, and Ibn Katheer for single women, married women, pregnant women, and divorced women, as seeing watercress indicates deception. And deception, bad talk, differences, many problems, material losses, failure, pressure and tension, and we will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing watercress in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of seeing watercress by Ibn Sirini. The dream interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream indicates the presence of problems in the case of washing. Cardamom indicates estrangement and dispersion. Watercress often indicates loss. Money and loss. Cardamom indicates the envy and injustice that the dreamer suffered from. Dreaming of cardamom in a dream indicates the misfortunes that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream for a single woman. Seeing watercress in a girl’s dreams may indicate a dispute between her and her boyfriend or girlfriend. It may indicate Fears and sorrows. If you believe that cardamom washes off, this may indicate the disappearance of fears and solutions to problems. It may indicate failure and failure as a failure to check or cancel engagement. It can indicate despair, negativity and surrender. It can indicate a girl’s beauty and attractiveness. Eat Cardamom in a dream for a single woman shows family or friendship problems. It can indicate obstacles you face in your studies or in the field of work. It can indicate weak faith in God and neglect of God. Interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream for a married woman. Seeing cardamom in a dream indicates problems and disagreements with her husband. Buying watercress may indicate a family dispute with neighbors or a friend. Seeing watercress washed indicates the disappearance of disputes and problems. Cardamom may indicate infertility or lack of birth control. It may indicate the presence of a disabled son from his parents. Seeing cutting watercress indicates cutting the uterus. Interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream for a divorced woman. It may indicate insomnia or illness. It may indicate moving away from the path of God and not worshiping. Regret may indicate bad action or speech against others. It explains psychological problems and suffering. Interpretation of seeing cardamom in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing green watercress indicates Fears, sorrows, and failure in childbirth. Seeing watercress indicates the birth of a male child. Washing watercress is one of the desirable things, and indicates the death of sorrows and anxiety. Interpretation of seeing watercress in a dream for a man. Seeing cardamom indicates a cunning and deceitful person in the dreamer’s life. It may mean abandoning work and material losses or Stagnation in trade. This may indicate that you are hearing offensive words such as gossip, insults and slander. Buying cardamom can indicate trouble and disagreement with someone at work or perhaps with a neighbour. Selling cardamom may indicate marital disputes and may indicate separation and divorce. Interpretation of seeing a bunch of rockets It can indicate positive energy and the beauty of a woman. It can indicate problems and differences. It can indicate a woman’s pregnancy and it can indicate the birth of a newborn child. Interpretation of a dream Missile management, bad news is coming. Yes

title: Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying her cousin from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying her cousin could be an indication of many meanings related to the dreamer’s life, and this is determined exactly according to her story. There are those who dream that she is marrying her unmarried cousin or that he is already married, and there are those who only see her engagement to her cousin, and a woman may dream of holding her cousin’s hand. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying her cousin. Interpretation of a dream about a girl marrying her cousin could be Good news for her that some aspects of goodness and blessing will enter her life, and therefore she must be optimistic and rejoice in what is to come and pray to God Almighty. Whatever he wants. A dream about marrying a cousin can be a sign of the nearness of success in work and commercial projects, and therefore the dreamer must not give up and work hard and diligently and ask for God Almighty’s help in every new step. A dream about marrying a cousin can be evidence of stability. The financial situation of the dreamer’s family, and this is a good thing, requires the dreamer to praise God a lot, as well as not to stop working properly to reach this stability, and God knows best. If the one who sees the dream of marrying a cousin is suffering from life problems and crises, then the dream could It is good news for her that relief will soon come from God Almighty and the emergence of comfort in life. Sometimes, the dream of marrying a cousin may just be an indication that there are some things in common between the dreamer and her uncle, as they may share some interests and talents, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream A girl marrying her cousin to Ibn Sirin. The dream of the scholar Ibn Sirin marrying portends many good things. The dreamer may soon get some happy things in her life and may, with the help of Almighty God, attain comfort and tranquility. A cousin who is doing well in a dream indicates the possibility that there are some good and blessed people in the dreamer’s life, and therefore she should not stop and give in to the obstacles and fears that stand in her way in life, and God knows best. I dreamed that I married my cousin and he is married. The dream could be about marriage. A married cousin is sometimes evidence of the extent of family cohesion. May God bless her and her family, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a cousin for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about marrying my cousin could be an indication of a girl’s need for love and experiencing a romantic situation with someone, but she must be careful not to fall into taboos for the sake of love. Or dream of marrying a cousin. It can indicate optimism and the need to maintain hope for the sake of love. For better days, and God knows best. An unmarried woman may dream that her cousin is smiling at her, and here the dream may indicate the coming of some pleasant events for the dreamer in the coming period, and this makes her feel happy and requires her to thank God Almighty a lot. Interpretation of dreams of my cousin hugging me with a woman Single: The dream of my cousin hugging me could be a sign of engagement and engagement or marriage soon, and here she warns the dreamer not to forget her religion and commit acts of mercy for the sake of engagement, or the dream of hugging the cousin could symbolize...

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing falling in a dream: Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in his dreams that he is falling from a high place, this means that the person who sees is approaching a new stage in his life, but if he sees that he is falling from a high place and has been seriously injured, this indicates that The person who sees that he will fall into a great misfortune in his life and face many problems. Interpretation of a dream about falling in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin says: As for falling, whoever dreams that someone has fallen on him will triumph over his enemy. And whoever sees that she has fallen from a high place such as a mountain, a wall, or the like, then this It indicates that what is meant is not complete. And whoever sees that he fell on his face, there is no benefit to him, even if he was in a fight or war. He was not victorious, and falling could refer to someone who has a flaw in his religion because he is involved in sins and temptations. And everyone who saw it fell in a mosque or... Rawdah or something like that. It was because of good deeds, or he intended to do so, then it indicates treachery. Interpretation of a dream about falling into water: Ibn Sirin interprets a dream about falling into water and not reaching the bottom as receiving financing with debts. But if one sees in a dream that he is falling into Stagnant water, then this is a sign of his sadness and sadness. Seeing a person in a dream falling into water free of dust or impurities is a sign of pleasure and joy. A man seeing that he is falling into water and then coming out of it easily. This is evidence that this person fell into stress and sadness but quickly got rid of it. Seeing someone dreaming of walking on water without falling into it is a sign of arrogance. Walking on water during a dream can indicate the health of the person’s insight. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place for single people says Dream interpretation scholars: Seeing a single girl falling in her dream is one of the visions worthy of praise. Because if a single girl sees that she is falling from above, this indicates that this is communication and entry into an emotional relationship soon. But if she is engaged, this vision indicates marriage. If an unmarried girl sees herself falling from a height to an unknown place, this indicates that she will suffer from anxiety, stress, and instability in her life. But if this place is beautiful, it means that a whole new phase of happiness and goodness will begin. A person may experience disturbing dreams when He is going through difficulty or a problem in his life. He sees in a dream that he has fallen from above and he notes fear in these dreams. If an unmarried woman sees herself falling from above, this may indicate the end of her life period and the beginning of a new relationship or a new marriage. A dream about falling into water for a man if he sees A man in a dream sees water coming out of the wall, this is a sign of sadness. When seeing a man in a dream, water coming out of the wall and it is stagnant, this is a sign of harm to health. Seeing water coming out of the house is a sign that worries and problems will soon be eliminated. Seeing a man In the dream that everyone is in the water and that there are many cases of drowning, this indicates suffering. The mud of the banner inside the house is evidence that the family of this amazing man has exploded.

title: The most prominent interpretations of buying land in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Buying land in a dream Many of us want to own land, whether agricultural or to establish a house to live in, but when the dreamer sees that he is buying land in a dream, he feels that he must search for its meaning, its multiple interpretations, and the connotations it carries, and through this article you will We explain the interpretation and different interpretations of the vision. Buying land in a dream. What is the interpretation of buying land in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about buying land in a dream is a sign of his high social status and his reaching a prominent position. Buying land in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will live a happy, stable, problem-free life and feel Rest and relax psychologically. When the dreamer sees that he is buying land in a dream and building a wall around it, this indicates that he is a hardworking person who is doing his best to secure his livelihood through legal means. When the dreamer sees that he is buying a share of land with another person, this vision indicates the beginning of a partnership in A business project with this person, through which he will obtain a large financial return. Buying land in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about buying land by Ibn Sirin is an indication that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money in the near future. Ibn Sirin explained that if the dreamer is looking for He worked in reality and saw that he was buying land in his dream, this indicates that he will find work in the near future. He explained that the vision of buying land is evidence of the marriage of its owner, whether he is a young man or a girl. When the dreamer buys a piece of land in his dream and sees that he is plowing that land, then this An indication of the charitable work he does in secret. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that buying land in a dream means that a bright future awaits the dreamer. Looking for Ibn Sirin’s interpretations? Enter from Google and see them all Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Buying land in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about buying land for an unmarried woman in her dream indicates that this girl will marry a man who enjoys wealth and is prominent in his work. Buying land for an unmarried woman in her dream is an indication that she will fulfill the desire that she She had aspired to achieve it for a long time. If an unmarried girl sees that she has bought land that has neither greenery nor water, this indicates that she will marry a man of bad character who will treat her dryly. Buying dry land in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates problems and obstacles that she will face in the future. Her life. Buying land in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees that she has bought land in her dream, this indicates that she is living a difficult life in reality and is suffering from limited livelihood, but the vision tells her that all these problems will disappear and that she will have a lot. It is good. Buying land in a dream for a married woman is evidence that her life with her husband is stable and that she lives a life full of luxury and comfort in life. When a married woman sees that she is buying land in her dream, this is evidence that she is seeking to bring her family to safety and will actually succeed. Seeing a woman A married woman bought dry land with cracks, so this vision is an indication of her bad condition and poor psychological state. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing reading Surah Yasin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

title: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream, and seeing a lover is a pleasant thing, and in the interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream, there are many interpretations, some of which are worthy of praise and vice versa. The subconscious mind, which is busy thinking about her lover, believes that this interpretation applies to all cases. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a single woman’s dream: Perhaps a dream about him indicates that he does not know the fate of the relationship between them, and this worries her greatly because she faces the unknown future. If a girl sees her lover in a dream and their relationship has ended, this indicates Also, she constantly thinks about him and cannot live a normal life without him. She must face the truth, look to her future and expect compensation from God. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for a married woman When a married woman sees her lover in a dream, this means that she is thinking about her ex-lover and that she is dissatisfied with her life with her husband. It could indicate the problems that exist between her and her husband and the dream shows that this woman will face many problems because she does not care about her home and her husband and she must be careful and close to her husband. And resolving their differences. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees her lover in a dream, this is evidence of her constant thinking and preoccupation with her old lover and indicates that she will face problems in her life. Seeing her in the arms of her lover shows her betrayal and she must see things differently. When she sees In a dream that she does not leave her lover, this indicates that she is trying all the ways that lead to her ex-lover and that she is loyal to her husband and shows her dissatisfaction with the husband with whom she lives. . Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream after separation. Seeing a lover in a dream after separation indicates that many changes will occur in the fortuneteller’s life, and perhaps the changes will be for the better or for the worse. When a girl sees her ex-boyfriend in a dream with another girl, this dream indicates that this girl The woman who saw her will fall into great distress, and the girl’s vision of her lover after breaking up in a dream with another lover is evidence that the girl will get married soon and live a happy life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flying over the sea

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flying over the sea Questions about the interpretation of dreams have become often asked, but it must be understood that the interpretation of a dream depends on many things related to the dreamer, because the interpretation of a dream can only be correct after the dreamer’s interpreter knows his life. But below we try to provide you with interpretations that are closer to the truth, as follows: Next, we learn about the interpretation of a dream about flying over the sea for all cases. Scientists say that whoever sees himself in a dream flying over the sea, this is a sign and indication that he will assume a new leadership position. Interpretation Scholars A single woman who saw herself flying over the sea indicates that she will soon find true happiness. Interpretation scholars believe that this is an indication that the god will achieve great success and have a good reputation among the people. Also, this vision is an indication that the dreamer enjoys stability and lives a A peaceful family. Some dream interpreters believe that flying over the sea is a sign that the dreamer is surrounded by many temptations and sins and is trying hard not to fall into them. Interpretation of a dream about flying over the sea by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees himself flying over the sea is a sign that he has many desires. Ibn Sirin believes that a person who sees himself flying over the sea and has a family and is responsible for it, symbolizes that he will get a new job or get a promotion. He confirms that a patient who sees himself flying over the sea indicates that he will meet his Lord soon, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees that he flew over the sea and landed somewhere, this is a sign of his journey and that the journey is good. He pointed out that flying with wings in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s situation will change for the better, God willing. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a person flying without wings as indicating how high he is and that The higher he rises in a dream, the more he will reach this height in reality. Interpretation of the dream of flying over the sea Nabulsi Nabulsi explained that whoever sees himself flying over the sea lying on his back, this symbolizes that he will travel on a journey in which he will feel comfortable and which will be a source of goodness for him. It is believed that if the dreamer is a prisoner Seeing himself flying over the sea means that the time of his freedom is approaching. If the dreamer is an expatriate, then seeing himself flying over the water is approaching the time of his return to his homeland and his family. Al-Nabulsi confirms that flying in a dream is a vision worthy of praise, as it is a cure for the sick, and the poor, And the unemployed, a good job opportunity. Interpretation of flying over the sea for single women: If a girl sees herself flying among a group of birds or people she does not know in reality, this indicates that she is establishing friendships in reality with strangers. Some believe that flying for a girl in a dream is a praiseworthy vision, indicating Indicates that she will get married and move to her husband’s house soon. When a girl sees in a dream that she is flying against her will, scholars interpreted this to mean that the decision cannot be made alone in reality and that there is someone who decides on her behalf. If the girl saw that she was flying over the sea, but in the end she She fell and could not complete the journey, Al-Mat said

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a clown with a dead person by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about having fun with the dead can indicate many meanings associated with the dreamer and his current and future life, according to the details of the vision. There are those who dream that they are joking with the deceased and laughing with him, and there are those who see him eating. Eating with the dead or traveling with him on a trip and other possible dreams. Interpretation of a dream about having fun with the dead: A dream about joking with the dead could be evidence of good morals that the viewer must adhere to, regardless of the problems and obstacles he faces in this life. The dream about joking with the dead It may indicate the need to stay away from bad behavior, desire good deeds, and repent to God Almighty for all of the above, and God knows best. With regard to the dream of talking to the dead, it may symbolize the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness and the need for someone to talk to to share various issues. Interpretation of the dream of joking With the dead, by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about a joker with a dead person by the scholar Ibn Sirin could warn the fortuneteller of obtaining ample livelihood and blessings in life, and this requires him to give thanks to God, Blessed and Most High. The dream of joking with the dead, his laughter, and then crying may be a sermon to the dreamer to stay away from sins and disobedience and to pray for the dead. Much for the forgiveness and mercy of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about joking with a dead person for a single woman: A dream about joking with a dead person, especially with an unmarried girl’s relative, can symbolize good morals, which the dreamer should not ignore in her life, regardless of the criticism and harassment she is exposed to. A dream of joking with a close dead person may indicate that the dreamer largely enjoys a stable and happy social life and this is a great blessing. The dreamer must be very thankful to God Almighty. A girl can see that she is joking with a dead person, but she is not happy about it, and here the dream of joking symbolizes With the deceased indicates the wrong attitudes that the dreamer must follow and focus on getting closer to God Almighty and doing good deeds. A dream about a dead person laughing with a fortuneteller could be good news about her imminent engagement, whether it is engagement or marriage, depending on her social status, and here the dreamer should be optimistic. With goodness and looking for God's guidance in her matter to guide her. She is on the right path. As for talking with the dead in a dream, it may indicate a feeling of loneliness and discomfort in this life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of joking with a dead person for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of joking with a dead person for a married woman may be evidence of the imminent arrival of some good news to her. Therefore, she should continue to hope and always pray to God for whatever she wants. Sometimes a dream about making fun of the dead indicates family stability that the dreamer can enjoy in the coming period, and here he should make every effort to achieve this stability and happiness in life. A dream about making fun of my parents The deceased smiling at me may symbolize the good reputation that the dreamer has and that she should not give up good deeds and good morals. Joking with the dead in a dream could also symbolize the approaching death.

title: The 50 most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin for seeing facial hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of facial hair in a dream for a married woman: All women suffer from it because its appearance is not pleasant, and when the appearance is removed, it becomes more beautiful. This vision is one of the strange visions that many women see in their sleep and makes them curious to know its meaning. It has many signs and indications, and in this topic we will explain in detail the elements in different cases, and in all aspects, follow this article with us. Interpretation of facial hair in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees long hair on her face in a dream, this is a sign of a worsening matter between her and her husband. A quarrel may arise between them. Seeing a married woman with thick facial hair similar to the appearance of a man in her dream shows her ability to overcome the difficulties and crises that she faces. Whoever sees in a dream that she is plucking her facial hair while she is already married, this is a sign of her separation from her husband, or perhaps it is time to meet God Almighty. Interpretation of facial hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. Many scholars and dream interpreters spoke about visions of facial hair in a dream for a married woman, including the well-known scholar Ibn Sirin. He said many points and points on this subject, and in the following cases we will explain some of the interpretations he said, follow us as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets a married woman’s facial hair in a dream as a sign that she will leave something dear to her. If a married woman sees her facial hair in her dream This is a sign of many crises and obstacles in her life. Seeing excess hair on his face in his dream means that he is surrounded by many evil people who hate him and wish that the blessings on him would disappear from his life, and he must be careful and stay away from them and protect himself well so that one does not get hurt badly. Interpretation of hair The face in a dream of a woman married to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets facial hair in a dream for a married woman, which indicates the emergence of many crises and difficulties in her life. If a married woman sees herself removing her facial hair in a dream, this is a sign that she will lose something valuable to her, or perhaps Long heated discussions take place between her and her children. Seeing a married woman removing her facial hair in her dream indicates her inability to control her children. Seeing a married dreamer with a black beard in a dream means that he has good moral qualities, including generosity and not being stingy with others, It gives them what the Almighty Creator has given her of blessings and benefits. Interpretation of facial hair in a dream for a married woman - Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi interprets facial hair in a dream for a married woman as an indication that our Lord Almighty will liberate the complicated matters of her life and liberate her from the sorrows that she has suffered from. If she sees a married woman In her dream that she removes her eyebrow hair, this is a sign that people always speak well of her and the reason behind this is that she has good qualities. If a married fortune teller cuts her facial hair in a dream, this symbolizes that she will become pregnant. Seeing a pregnant dreamer cutting her hair in a dream It indicates the approaching date of childbirth. Interpretation of facial hair in a dream for a pregnant woman
